title: People who only "counterpicks" in ranked even though they main other champs.
body:
What do you think of them? Do you think they are actually having fun? 

Everytime my friend first picks nasus, the enemy team picks teemo (insta lock it too). In the end the enemy team lost because those counterpickers only played teemo like once in ranked and I believe they lack the experience to actually "counter" enemy champ.
